title: Rankdecay
body:
Hey guys, I am currently d5 0 lp and i'm afraid of demotion and want to maintain my rank. Mostly cause I {{champion:141}}  main  and he is always countered in high elo. Anyway i was wondering if my rank will ever drop. I heard something about gold having no decay, but thats all I know. I was wondering if my rank will decay. My last played game was Oct 15. I am begging to know if the decay days will end before or after the season. 

<3 Love you rito.

replies.body: [**Decay for Diamond**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204010760#h3q2) rank starts 28 days after the last game you played. After that, you lose LP every 7 days until you play a game in that queue.
so if i don't play I wont be deranked? If my last game was October 15th.
